create_menu_par(name, trig_func, menu, shrt_cut)¶

Function create actions in menu

Parameters

  • name (str) – name of action

  • trig_func (function) – name of action function

  • menu (QMenu) – menu object, menu in menubar

  • shrt_cut (str) – shortcut for action, optional
